Protocol.Description: Check the connection of network
Before server actively disconnect
Verification of identity
Verification of identity
Before server actively disconnect
Verification of identity
error message
create room
when somebody enters a room, client sends this message to the server
when somebody entered a room, server broadcast this message to all of clients in this room.
when a client wants to leave form a room, need to send this message to the server.
when a client left from a room, server broadcasts this message to all of clients in this room.
when a client is ready to start a game, needs to send this message to the server.
when a client was ready to start a game, server broadcasts this message to all of clients in this room
when a client apply for disbanding or agree/desagree to disband a room, needs to send this message to the server.
when a client applied for disbanding a room, the server needs to ask all of clients if they agree
when a room was disbanded successfully regardless of success or failure, the server broadcasts this message to all of clients in this room.
when a client goes offline or online, the server broadcasts this message to all in this room.
when a client wants to obtain all of informations of a room, for example when a client reconnected.
when a client reconnect the server if the client has been in a room.
when a client reconnect to the server, need to check if is in a room.
when a game starts, the server broadcasts this message.
when a player draws a mahjong
when a player discards a mahjong
when a player discard a mahjong
when a client Chow/Pong/Kong etc.
when a client Chow/Pong/Kong etc.
when one game of all of games is over
when all of games are over
server returns room info to the client
when a player can operate
when a player need to choice if operate, broadcast to others
add robot
